doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 27
Gay USA, Vol. XIV, Episode No. 27
1. Lesbian and Gay News: Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
COMMERCIAL: GMHC (Gay Men's Health Crisis), "Help us help."
2. Footage of 27th Lesbian and Gay Pride Week Drag March.
3. Footage of Lee Sharmat at Rally for Justice, to commemorate 10th anniversary of Bowers v. Hardwick. Includes footage of Mark Green, NYC Public Advocate.
COMMERCIAL: "Support Human Rights for Lesbian and Gay People", sponsored by Professionals in Film/Video. Includes Cathay Che of GLAAD.
4. Footage of Dyke March. Includes Lee Sharmat interviewing Kim Barget.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, National Alliance for Research on Schizophrenia and Depression
5. Footage of 1996 Gay and Lesbian Pride March.

7. "Lambda Update": William Peters, Development Director of Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund, introduces Lou Maletta's interview with Kim Kirkley, Lambda Staff Attorney, regarding a custody case involving two lesbians.
COMMERCIAL: Ad Council, Crime Prevention Coalition and US Department of Justice
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra, "The one. The only. The original."
COMMERCIAL: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), "America Responds to AIDS"
